bullets.text: Developed ML model achieving 92% accuracy in predicting customer churn, enabling proactive retention strategies that saved $3M annually
Built end-to-end data pipeline processing 100GB+ daily, reducing analyst query time from 4 hours to 15 minutes
Created interactive dashboards in Tableau serving 200+ stakeholders, democratizing access to business insights
Implemented A/B testing framework that increased experimentation velocity by 5x, leading to 20% improvement in conversion rate
Deployed NLP pipeline for sentiment analysis processing 500K+ customer reviews, informing product prioritization
